content.user_title: Automate Claude Code with intelligent hooks
content.value_statement: Managing development workflows manually wastes time and creates inconsistencies. This skill provides automated hook coordination for Claude Code that validates, formats, and learns from every operation. It reduces repetitive tasks and improves code quality automatically.
actual_capabilities: Pre-operation hooks for validation and agent assignment
Post-operation hooks for formatting and pattern training
Session management with state persistence and restoration
Memory coordination for cross-agent knowledge sharing
Git integration with quality gates and commit automation
MCP tool integration for swarm coordination
limitations: Only works with Claude Code and compatible tools
Custom hooks require JavaScript knowledge to create
Memory persistence depends on MCP server availability

best_practices: Configure hooks during project initialization to establish consistent patterns from the start
Use memory keys with clear namespaces like 'swarm/{agent}/{task}' for easy retrieval
Set appropriate timeouts for heavy operations and use async execution to avoid blocking
anti_patterns: Avoid running complex operations synchronously in hooks that may time out
Do not skip validation hooks even for small changes to maintain quality standards
Avoid hardcoding file paths; use dynamic patterns that work across projects

faq.question: Which tools are compatible with this skill?
faq.answer: This skill works with Claude Code, OpenAI Codex, and any MCP-compatible tool that supports hook configurations.

faq.question: What are the performance limits for hooks?
faq.answer: Recommended hook execution time is under 100ms. Heavy operations should run asynchronously with continueOnError enabled.

faq.question: How do I integrate with existing CI/CD pipelines?
faq.answer: Configure session-end hooks to export metrics and generate reports. Use notify hooks to send status updates to Slack, Teams, or custom webhooks.

faq.question: Is my code and data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This skill only executes commands you specify in configuration. It runs locally through claude-flow CLI and never sends code to external servers.

faq.question: Why are my hooks not executing?
faq.answer: Check that .claude/settings.json has valid JSON syntax, verify hook matcher patterns are correct, and ensure claude-flow is installed and in your PATH.

faq.question: How does this compare to traditional git hooks?
faq.answer: Claude Code hooks extend git hooks with AI capabilities like automatic agent assignment, neural pattern learning, and cross-session memory persistence.
